channel.title: CVE Feed for starfishwp -- Rich Reviews by Starfish
channel.description: The latest CVEs for starfishwp -- Rich Reviews by Starfish

item.title: CVE-2019-25216|2024-10-16T06:43:44.093Z -- starfishwp -- rich%20reviews%20by%20starfish
item.description: The Rich Review plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the POST body 'update' parameter in versions up to, and including, 1.7.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
